name: ChoreTracker
0:
”Alexa, tell Chore Tracker I cleaned the kitchen today.”
”I washed the car on Sunday”
”When's the last time I washed the car?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chore tracker
des:
Don't just use the smell test to figure out when you last washed your jeans. Tell Alexa to, "tell Chore Tracker I washed my jeans December 10th." Then, months later when you're deciding between grabbing something clean, or picking your comfortable jeans up from the floor, ask, "Alexa, ask Chore Tracker when's the last time I washed my jeans?"

Use Chore Tracker to remember the last time you did a variety of chores and tasks:
 - went to the gym
 - called Mom
 - shaved my legs
 - vacuumed the living room rug
 - got car maintenance
...and more!

The chore you want to add not able to be found easily by Alexa? Submit your requests to add more chores at:
http://www.iyang.xyz/choretracker.html
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
